title: New explorers
creator_credit: James Hill, James Carr and World Wide Pictures
brief_description: How experts in various methods of prospecting seek oil throughout the world. The principle locations in the film are Papua, Sicily, Canada, Trinidad, Zanzibar and the Persian Gulf.
creator_credit_for_label: James Hill, James Carr and World Wide Pictures
